original_text: He will be small and dangerous, like a snake that lies beside the road. He will be like a snake that bites the legs of horses so that the riders fall off.
korean_text: 단은 길섶의 뱀이요 샛길의 독사로다 말굽을 물어서 그 탄 자를 뒤로 떨어지게 하리로다

sentences.original_text: He will be small and dangerous
like a snake that lies beside the road
He will be like a snake that bites the legs of horses
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 말의 다리를 무는 뱀처럼 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: so that the riders fall off
